answerText: The Sailor Who Fell from Grace with the Sea [or Gogo no Eiko; or Afternoon Towing][10] In this novel by the same author, Mizoguchi befriends Kashiwagi and becomes an acolyte under Father Dosen, but ultimately goes mad and decides to burn down the title structure.
heading: Missiles of October |2011 | 5 | 14 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: One character in this novel removes the drawers from a dresser and crawls in to watch his mother undressing through a peephole. For 10 points each: [10] Name this novel, in which Noboru admires the masculinity of the title character, who begins courting his mother, Fusako.
